content: "What good people," thought Pinocchio to himself. And forgetting his father, the new coat, the A-B-C book, and all his good resolutions, he said to the Fox and to the Cat: "Let us go. I am with you."
translations: ita:Che brava gente, pensò dentro di sé Pinocchio. E dimenticando suo padre, il cappotto nuovo, l'abbecedario, e tutti i suo
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
